com.github.jaiimageio.impl.common

Class LZWCompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jaiimageio.impl.common.LZWCompressor

  • public class LZWCompressor
extends Object
    Modified from original LZWCompressor to change interface to passing a buffer of data to be compressed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LZWCompressor

        public LZWCompressor(ImageOutputStream out,
                     int codeSize,
                     boolean TIFF)
              throws IOException
        Parameters:
        out - destination for compressed data
        codeSize - the initial code size for the LZW compressor
        TIFF - flag indicating that TIFF lzw fudge needs to be applied
        Throws:
        IOException - if underlying output stream error

        public void flush()
           throws IOException
